name: cool spinning cat
description:
the coolest cat around (not actually but ok)

if you want an easier time playing just download the txt file and not the executable because it has a really annoying setup thing that i wish it didn't have but it was just made that way after turning into an exe.

i already put this as a note but im sorry about the setup its very annoying and i wish i could remove it but i can't because i would have to redo everything and it took a while to make.
